utilityTabs.information:
**Functional Purpose**: Tab title for the 'Information' section.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Representation → Right pane (tabs list)
**When Users See This**: Always visible when the right pane is open
**Technical Context**: Standard text for a tab title
**Current English**: "Information"

**When Users See This**: Always visible when the right pane is open

**Current English**: "Scratchpad"

representationFeedbackEditor.previewAndS:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to preview and submit feedback.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Representation → Right pane (feedback editor footer)
**When Users See This**: After a user has typed feedback into the editor and the button is enabled.
**Technical Context**: This button is disabled if the editor's value does not contain any alphanumeric characters. Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Preview & Submit"
